A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can't believe that I didn't like this.  If you'd asked me just two days ago\, I would have told you that you could roll a rotten grapefruit out and make some vague BB-8 sounds and I would have sat my brown butt down and watched that rotten grapefruit like it was Citizen Kane.

The various storylines were just nonsensical and I couldn't bring myself to care about anything.  None of the questions from The force Awakens were answered (or at least not in a remotely satisfying way).

Grumpy Luke\, confused Rey\, surprise force ghost....it was really hard to mess this movie up\, yet somehow they managed to do it spectacularly.
